title: SMNTY Classics: Black Romantic Comedies
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Black Romantic Comedies
description:
Romantic comedies remain one of Hollywood's most segregated film genres. In this classic episode, Cristen and Caroline compare the development, tropes and racial tensions within monochromatic rom com worlds.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
